DOC.brief_summary: This study examines the effect of vitamin D on Retinal changes in patient with optic Neuritis.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Vitamin D on Retinal Changes in Patient With Optic Neuritis by Optic Coherence Tomography
DOC.criteria: age 1550 years no history of demyelinative events level of vitamin d below 20 ng/ml no pass 1032 day from starting symptom using vitamin D supplement
